en:
方便
(Fāngbiàn)

Convenience

Definitions of 方便
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

adjective
    convenient
        方便, 便利, 便于, 便, 便当, 合宜

noun
    convenience
        方便, 便利, 无忧虑
    easement
        缓和, 方便

verb
    go to the lavatory
        方便
    have money to spare or lend
        方便

adverb
    comfortably
        舒服, 方便, 合适
